title: Initial Access
description: Enter the 4-digit code on the keypad. The order of entry does not matter.

title: Troubleshooting Lockouts
description: If the screen locks up (numbers displayed, unresponsive), repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This indicates a reset.

title: Reaccessing after Lockout
description: Once the screen is reset (blank with red blink), re-enter the 4-digit code to access the system.

title: Successful Entry Confirmation
description: Observe the system response to confirm successful entry. This might involve a change in display, an audible signal, or access being granted.

title: Troubleshooting Continued Issues
description: If problems persist, contact support or refer to the user manual for further assistance.
